events.message: We have successfully received your application for the senior software engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department, specifically for the software developer position.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview went well, and the technical team has expressed interest in moving forward.
Thank you for promptly responding with your availability for the technical interview, which we truly appreciate.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM; please ensure you have a quiet and uninterrupted environment.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 25th at 2 PM to discuss company culture and benefits in detail.
Your HR interview concluded positively, with a strong alignment on both cultural fit and your career aspirations.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer position, reflecting your experience and expected contributions.
Thank you for your thoughtful feedback on the offer; we are glad the terms meet your expectations.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and setting up your development environment.
The hiring process is now officially closed and you have successfully joined the company as a software engineer.
